item.description: web-view # web-view It is a web browser component that can be used to host a web page container, which will automatically fill the entire page (nvue use requires manual specification of width and height). For each applet platform, the URL loaded by the web-view needs to configure the domain name whitelist in the background, including other URLs embedded in the iframe again. Property description Attribute name Types of Description Platform difference description src String webview links to web pages allow String Used to specify the characteristic strategy for the iframe sandbox String This attribute enables some additional restrictions on the content rendered in the iframe frame.
